pr_title: [#1611] MetaData deserilization and Ignoring Snapshots on readEvents for seqNo = 0

timeline.message:
Ensure usage of gRPC aware Serializer

When retrieving an Aggregate stream, there is a window of opportunity
that the default snapshot/event serializer is used, instead of the
GrpcMetaDataAwareSerializer version. As a result, MetaData might be
missed out on. This should be resolved by overriding the
getSnapshotSerializer/getEventSerializer methods in the
AxonServerEventStore and by using these methods in the
AbstractEventStorageEngine consistently. This issue only comes to light
if snapshotFilters are used, since only then will AxonServer be
requested for snapshots and events separately. The latter caused a call
which doesn't use this specific serializer

#1611

Ignore snapshots for readEventData invocation with seqNo 0

The validation to take snapshots into account when retrieving events
from Axon Server check for a seqNo > 0. This should be >= instead.

timeline.message:
Don't allow snapshots if snapshot filter is set

Snapshots shouldn't be taken into account when retrieving events if a
snapshot filter has been set. Add test cases consciously validating all
three options in readEventData(String, long)
